name: Vague reporting request

userMessages.content: Our customers keep asking for usage reports. They want to see how many users are active, which features are being used, and trends over time. Right now we have nothing.
Each organization should only see their own data obviously. They should be able to pick date ranges and export to CSV. Monthly and weekly granularity would work.
That's a good start. Let's do that first and see what customers say.

expectedOpenQuestions: Should reports be generated on-demand or pre-computed?
Are there specific KPIs or metrics the customers care about most?
Should reports be schedulable and auto-delivered via email?
What volume of data needs to be handled per report?
